metadata.name: eddy currents #40
metadata.description:
When Jackson Pollock met Michael Faraday, a new form of abstract art was created.

eddy currents arise when a conductor is placed in a changing magnetic field. These currents typically form closed loops, and themselves generate a magnetic field which tends to oppose the one that created it.

The metal cores of electrical transformers are often laminated to form thin bounded regions which minimize the eddy currents by constricting them to a small space.

The abstract art embodied in this piece depicts the eddy currents in such laminated structures.

Press "s" to save the image in a .png format file
Press "f" to terminate the drawing early (if you like some intermediate image).

metadata.name: Spaziotempo #53
Absorbed #106
metadata.description:
A collaboration between leading British high-end audio brand KEF, generative artist hieroglyphica, and creative studio Parameta, Absorbed embodies the process of noise becoming high-fidelity sound through KEF’s Metamaterial Absorption Technology (MAT™). 

MAT™ makes the KEF sound what it is: absorbing unwanted distortion to deliver pure, accurate sound exactly as the artist intended. Inspired by this intricacy, Absorbed illustrates pseudorandom networks of patterns, slowly emerging and transforming into the maze-like form of MAT™. Clarity is revealed, noise is absorbed – high-fidelity is found.

The noise fields used in Absorbed are of two distinct types: conventional gradient noise and “sinusoidal” noise, an original algorithm developed for this series. The use of animation as artistic medium reflects the artists’ belief that no single frame can capture the full range of complexity found in the tension between sound and noise, and lets collectors observe for themselves this ever-shifting dialogue. A more extensive discussion of the algorithms used in Absorbed can be found in hieroglyphica’s companion article on fx(text).

- spacebar will pause and resume the animation
- s will save a still image of the current frame
- technically minded collectors can consult the index.html file for info on how to render and save high-resolution images
- use of hardware acceleration in Chrome may impact performance

Founded by BBC engineer Raymond Cooke in 1961, KEF is a leading British innovator of high-end audio products including HiFi speakers, subwoofers, architectural speakers, wireless speaker-systems, and headphones. Find out more at kef.com or visit our Discord at discord.com/invite/u48Z9yjY2q.

metadata.name: GEN XYZ Das Occult #9311
metadata.description:
A 10k Generative Profile Pic collection
GEN XYZ Das Occult - by culla - @tamccullough

move over cryptopunks
there is a new group on the scene

100% code - not an image composition

A bunch of common palettes
A selection of rare palettes
And a smaller set of ultra rare palettes
However, rarity will be based on what combinations the code produces

The majority of tokens will not have a special trait
However your token might have one or even multiple special traits
But, be aware that only the last special trait added will be listed in the features

Even then, look closely, because not all aspects of the canvas are included in the features. Collectors should still look closely and choose what they like when buying on secondary.

Which team are you on? X or O?

follow culla on twitter for updates. Or maybe __acolyte__

If the non reserved tokens mint out quickly, Access List mints will have 24 hours to mint reserves assigned to those wallets

Thank you for supporting an emerging artist in the generative art space

Access List reserves were given to holders of the following PFP collections created by culla
2x for each Basqunk held
1x for each Inkspunk, TwoFourQunk, V0iD, DeeManz, Punkasso and CR0$$KULL
You would have needed to transfer the above tokens to your mint wallet at the time of the snapshot

share your tokens on social media with #genxyznft
Made with love by culla using p5.js

metadata.name: Planeta #13
metadata.description:
A planet built of buildings bricks. 

Code made in P5js by Diego de los Campos under NFT License 2.0

metadata.name: The Restoration Scheme: Bleaching #5
metadata.description:
“Bleaching” is the third episode of “The Restoration Scheme” Series. The work was based on Acropora digitifera. 

Corals derive their colors from symbiotic algae. With the change of environment, such as rising water temperature, symbiotic algae leave the coral and therefore it becomes white. Coral bleaching does not mean death, but it does mean that the coral has lost its source of nutrients without symbiotic algae. The coral will be starving to death little by little if the environment does not improve.

——

“The Restoration Scheme” Series
It’s a virtual action extended from the coral restoration plan led by Delta Electronics Foundation from Taiwan, consisting of five generative corals. Each of them was based on five different species of coral as the theme.
If collectors mint virtual corals, Delta Electronics Foundation will drop coral seedlings collectively in the sea. 

The project is powered by FAB DAO (Formosa Art Bank). The split will donate to the local organization from Taiwan dedicated to the coral restoration scheme.

——

About Delta 
Climate change is causing irreversible impacts. Coral reefs, known for their rich biodiversity and the capability to nourish a quarter of marine life, are at the forefront of the crisis. Also known as "tropical rainforests" in the sea, coral reefs have experienced five mass bleaching events in the past five years. Once global warming exceeds the 2˚C thresholds, it's likely that 99% of coral reefs will die off worldwide.

In addition to launching a coral restoration initiative along the northeast coast of Taiwan, Delta Electronics Foundation collaborates with Asia University to host "Earth Pulsing: Nurturing Life Exhibition" and releases the first art NFT featuring coral restoration. Through these actions, we hope to evoke public awareness of ecological issues. For more information, please visit https://delta50.deltaww.com/initiative/sea.html

——

35 ~ 60 corals to render. You might need some patience for the result.

double click or press 's' to save as an image
made with p5.js and chroma.js

____________________________

《白化》為《恢復方案》系列第三作，品種為指形軸孔珊瑚。

珊瑚的顏色來自共生藻，隨著環境變化（如水溫上升），共生藻離開了珊瑚，珊瑚露出了白色。所以珊瑚白化其實不等於死亡，但共生藻的離開意味著珊瑚失去了養分來源。在環境沒有改善的狀況下，珊瑚就會慢慢餓死。

——

《恢復方案》
恢復方案是虛擬演算珊瑚實驗，一系列共五件的生成珊瑚作品，每一件對應到特定珊瑚物種。本實驗與台達電子文教基金會合作，藏家每收藏一件 NFT，台達電子文教基金會就會實際在海中植下一株對應的珊瑚苗。這項專案與 FAB DAO （福爾摩沙藝術銀行）支援鑄造，部分分潤將直接捐助給台灣在地珊瑚保育組織，詳細資訊將於 FAB DAO Twitter 公佈。

——

關於台達電子文教基金會氣候變遷引發許多不可逆的環境衝擊，以豐富生物多樣性著稱、滋養四分之一海洋生物的珊瑚，便是首當其衝的受害者。
被譽為「海中熱帶雨林」的珊瑚生態系，已在最近五年遭遇三次大白化，一旦升溫跨越攝氏2℃，屆時恐有多達99％的珊瑚瀕臨滅絕。
近年在東北角投入珊瑚復育的台達電子文教基金會，今年與亞洲大學共同策畫「地球˙脈動中」生態與藝術特展，並合作發行全台首見的珊瑚生成藝術NFT，喚起社會大眾對生態議題的重視。更多資訊可參考: https://delta50.deltaww.com/initiative/sea.html

metadata.name: Absorbed #109
metadata.description:
A collaboration between leading British high-end audio brand KEF, generative artist hieroglyphica, and creative studio Parameta, Absorbed embodies the process of noise becoming high-fidelity sound through KEF’s Metamaterial Absorption Technology (MAT™). 

MAT™ makes the KEF sound what it is: absorbing unwanted distortion to deliver pure, accurate sound exactly as the artist intended. Inspired by this intricacy, Absorbed illustrates pseudorandom networks of patterns, slowly emerging and transforming into the maze-like form of MAT™. Clarity is revealed, noise is absorbed – high-fidelity is found.

The noise fields used in Absorbed are of two distinct types: conventional gradient noise and “sinusoidal” noise, an original algorithm developed for this series. The use of animation as artistic medium reflects the artists’ belief that no single frame can capture the full range of complexity found in the tension between sound and noise, and lets collectors observe for themselves this ever-shifting dialogue. A more extensive discussion of the algorithms used in Absorbed can be found in hieroglyphica’s companion article on fx(text).

- spacebar will pause and resume the animation
- s will save a still image of the current frame
- technically minded collectors can consult the index.html file for info on how to render and save high-resolution images
- use of hardware acceleration in Chrome may impact performance

Founded by BBC engineer Raymond Cooke in 1961, KEF is a leading British innovator of high-end audio products including HiFi speakers, subwoofers, architectural speakers, wireless speaker-systems, and headphones. Find out more at kef.com or visit our Discord at discord.com/invite/u48Z9yjY2q.

metadata.name: Contort #229
metadata.description:
Contort is the result of combining several previously meaningless experiments and learnings into a single cohesive algorithm. The project comes in a variety of shapes, bends, twists, colors, and other variations.  

The artwork builds towards the end-result by rendering a fixed number of forms per frame to ensure a smooth rendering process. Rendering times can vary depending on which features are combined by the hash.

metadata.name: tratti #143
metadata.description:
"tratti" is an Italian word that has many different meanings. When we started working on this piece, we wanted to create something that combines our traits ("tratti" in Italian).
We had this urge to channel the turbulent times we're living in now into this artwork using just lines ("tratti" in Italian).

We don't know what to do now, we're here, and that's all that matters. We're here for our families, our friends, and our community. Like everything in life, there are joyful times and challenging times. We must accept happiness as something that is not constant but that we feel at times (a "tratti" in Italian).

With "tratti", we want to send a message to every disheartened human being: "Stay strong and never let anyone or anything crush the hope in you. Joyful times are around the corner".

---- 

© 2022 — Alessandro Fiore x Emanuele Pasin
LICENSE.md for detailed licensing info

metadata.name: Release #64
metadata.description:
[…]

More than anything she had wanted to show him where she had lived, where, at a specific time every year, endless fields sent a new cycle of pods on their way.

She preferred to experience these moments alone, imagining the spectacle was being performed just for her. The whole act carried a promise of new beginnings, of paths yet to be taken.

She wasn't really part of any of this, but she too had the coordinates to her own life programmed into her genes.

Any decision would be true now, any path free.

A chorus of explosions sounded as the field burst open.

[…]

–

You can append these parameters to the URL:

[scale=<number>] scale the renderer.
[long-side=<number>] define the number of pixels of the longest side.
[animation=false] skip animating the lines.
[mode=monotone] activate monotone mode.
[detail=<number 0–1>] coarser (0) or finer (1) lines, default: 0.5.

Press [control / command + s] or [tap and hold] to save the current frame.
	- in normal mode: PNG file.
	- in monotone mode: SVG file, suitable for plotting.

Note: The monotone SVG file has no defined dimensions. It is suitable for plotting at 30 × 30 cm. with a 0.25 mm. pen tip. When plotting in larger sizes, you can increase the [detail] parameter to keep contrast with the same pen.

© 2022 Monokai.

metadata.name: Device 1 #85
metadata.description:
No text to be read, only characters.

Keys

t : TXT snapshot
p : PNG snapshot 2×
P : PNG snapshot 4×
f : Toggle framerate
↑ : Increase scale
↓ : Decrease scale
0 : Auto scale
i : Toggle info

metadata.name: Trasiedoc #330
metadata.description:
Behind every generative art project is a code. This code is sometimes a masterpiece but most viewers do not see it.

With the Trasiedoc project I wanted to highlight the hidden face of generative art, the code, by literally integrating the code of my biggest project to date (Dencity) in each output of the Trasiedoc project.

Margins can be hidden by pressing "x" in live mode (and optionally press "p" to see if anything happens).

Made with ❤️, code, code and p5js.

metadata.name: Your Shadow Demon Fren #75
metadata.description:
To celebrate Halloween, a portal to the shadow world has opened up and a Shadow Demon Fren has emerged to follow you home. 

----

8 backgrounds - equal rarity
12 eyes - equal rarity
15 shadow parts - larger frens + trait = more rare
9 mouths - equal rarity
8 textures - mostly equal, but" circus" and "zaaaap" are rare and "slimy halloween" is common.

----
Thanks to @purespider for his image composition code.
4% royalties go to the minter, so go buck wild and mint a shadow demon army!
50% of primary and royalties go towards funding future #darktez events!

metadata.name: Saṅkhāra #68
metadata.description:
🎧 CLICK/TAP FOR SOUND ON

Saṅkhāra is a portrait of symbolic consciousness in three movements.

Colorful automata represents direct experience: touch, sight, hearing, smell, taste and thought in a ceaseless flow of novelty.

The automata congeals into form alluding to the way our minds close over experience with symbolic representation, like a plastic bag coming down over a kaleidoscope of butterflies. What was free in the open air is now trapped. What was previously wild and unpredictable is now under control, frozen and communicable.

The form’s dispersal mimics the release of mental formation, the unbinding of a symbol, the letting go of a belief. It’s a visceral reflection of the process of ceasing to identify with separateness. To strain the previous metaphor, it’s the opening of the bag and letting the butterflies return to the flow of raw, boundless experience.

—

K.C. Austin
From his cockpit in the Blue Ridge Mountains K.C. Austin (aka bzor) spends his days shaping realtime software art systems of all stripes. Informed by game design, modular synths, virtual reality and consciousness research, K.C. plays shaders like a fiddle and fashions creative pipelines like a spider spins webs.

James Paterson
Fascinated by the relationship between ancient and futuristic mediums, James Paterson has been exploring a unique synthesis of drawing, code, animation and sculpture under the moniker ‘Presstube’ since 1999. Paterson draws inspiration from meditation, molecular biology, music, parenting and psychedelics - the seen, the heard, the felt, the cognized.
